name: chronologically
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that follows the order in which a series of events happened: The dates are arranged chronologically. The essays are organized thematically rather than chronologically. See
chronological
More examplesFewer examplesThe five hundred chronologically organized pages provide a factual, historical narrative. Posts are shown chronologically on the web pageThe story unfolds chronologically.
